name: Escape! (itch) (Aran Timon)
description:
Escape! is an Android 2D top-down endless perspective scrolling survival game with a pixel art style based in a native American village during the pirate golden age. You will need to dodge the arrows and spears the enemy throw at you and at the same time not collide against the objects in front of you while you try to escape!

How to play
  • Tap on the right side of the screen to swipe to the next line on the right
  • Tap on the left side of the screen to swipe to the next line on the left
  • Swipe up to jump
  • Swipe down to slide
